subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Samoa ended a five-match losing streak at the Rugby World Cup in France yesterday with a 25-21 defeat of the United States in its final Group A match. Samoa, which made the quarterfinals in 1991 and 1995, lost its last two games in 2003 and its first three this year.
